snippet.title: Russian Subway Dogs - PS4 and Vita Announcement Trailer!
snippet.description:
Russian Subway Dogs is a fast-paced action-arcade game inspired by the real-life stray dogs of the Moscow Metro. Coming to PS4, Vita, Steam and Itch.io in 2018!
Find out more at: http://www.russiansubwaydogs.com
